name: blamesomeone
0:
”Alexa, ask Blame Someone who did it.”
”Alexa, ask Blame Someone to add Jeff.”
”Alexa, ask Blame Someone to list the troublemakers.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blame someone
des: Did the kids leave a mess and no one will admit to it? Is a work project going poorly and someone needs to be blamed? Do you have a list of suspects and don't know who's at fault? If so then the Blame Someone skill can help. Ask Blame Someone "Who did it?" and Alexa will determine the troublemaker from a list of individuals.
